message_1: Consider the temporal logic formula F[5,10]p, where p is a proposition that can be either true (T) or false (F) at each time instant. Determine if the formula is satisfied for the following truth value assignments for p at time instants 1 through 15: TTTTTTTTTTFFFFF.
message_2:
The temporal logic formula F[5,10]p means that there exists a time instant within the interval [5, 10] such that the proposition p is true.

Given the truth value assignments for p at time instants 1 through 15: TTTTTTTTTTFFFFF

We can check the truth values of p within the interval [5, 10]:

- At time instant 5: p is True (T)
- At time instant 6: p is True (T)
- At time instant 7: p is True (T)
- At time instant 8: p is True (T)
- At time instant 9: p is True (T)
- At time instant 10: p is True (T)

Since there exists at least one time instant within the interval [5, 10] where the proposition p is true, the temporal logic formula F[5,10]p is satisfied for the given truth value assignments.
